content: You can even try using Pluck of Many to let your summons hit him from behind while you distract his largely single-target attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Able'.
The content is as follows:
You can even try using Pluck of Many to let your summons hit him from behind while you distract his largely single-target attacks.
